response: narrative=Ellie Brown was last seen leaving her home on An t-Sràid, PA34 5UG with plans to attend her grandchild's school events later in the day. Before leaving, she was observed to have withdrawn cash from her local branch, which was not unusual for her visits to the nearby amusement park where she loved to treat her family. Concern rose when she failed to attend the school events and did not return home. Despite the low risk level, her family grew worried due to her disability. After an extensive search, staff traced her to Railway Pier, Oban, PA34 4LW, safe and unharmed. It appears she simply lost track of time during her outing.
